introHeading.context: Displayed to users when they are configuring the plugin

introContent.text: This is where you can place some high-level information to help the user configure your plugin
introContent.context: Additional info for users on what steps to take

defaultFieldNameRespondentFirstName.context: Respondent First Name form field name

defaultFieldTooltipRespondentFirstName.context: Respondent First Name form field tooltip

defaultFieldNameRespondentLastName.context: Respondent Last Name form field name

defaultFieldTooltipRespondentLastName.context: Respondent Last Name form field tooltip

addFieldDropdownLabel.context: The label for the dropdown to add additional form fields

customFieldLabel.context: The label to add a dynamic key-value pair to the form

customFieldNameTooltip.text: The Key for this Custom Field
customFieldNameTooltip.context: The tooltip for the key of the newly added dynamic field

customFieldValueTooltip.text: The Value for this Custom Field
customFieldValueTooltip.context: The tooltip for the value of the newly added dynamic field

customFieldNamePlaceholder.context: The placeholder for key of the newly added dynamic field

customFieldValuePlaceholder.context: The placeholder for value of the newly added dynamic field

formData.context: The form data outputted in the worker.js function

result.context: The result of the worker.js function

selectMenuLabel.context: The label for the Select Menu or dropdown

selectMenuGenericErrorMessage.text: An issue is affecting the dropdown functionality
selectMenuGenericErrorMessage.context: The generic error message for the dropdown

selectMenuOptionInvalidErrorMessage.text: Your selected option is no longer available
selectMenuOptionInvalidErrorMessage.context: A specific error message for the dropdown when a menu option is no longer available to the use
